## Protocol.Target.SetAutoAttachRequest interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SetAutoAttachRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoAttach](./puppeteer.protocol.target.setautoattachrequest.autoattach.md) | boolean | Whether to auto-attach to related targets. |
|  [flatten](./puppeteer.protocol.target.setautoattachrequest.flatten.md) | boolean | Enables "flat" access to the session via specifying sessionId attribute in the commands. We plan to make this the default, deprecate non-flattened mode, and eventually retire it. See crbug.com/991325. |
|  [waitForDebuggerOnStart](./puppeteer.protocol.target.setautoattachrequest.waitfordebuggeronstart.md) | boolean | Whether to pause new targets when attaching to them. Use <code>Runtime.runIfWaitingForDebugger</code> to run paused targets. |
